Scripts.Name: ItemSelector
Scripts.Body: var value = args.value; return value.Id + '/' + value.DisplayName;

Scripts.Name: OnClosing
Scripts.Body: var defer = $.Deferred(); console.log('close TabPage after 3 sec');setTimeout(function () {defer.resolve('ok');}, 3000); return defer.promise();

Scripts.Name: ValidationErrors
Scripts.Body: console.log(arguments); debugger; console.log('ValidationErrors'); return {isValid: false, items: [{message: 'Error'}, {property: 'birthday', message: 'birthday error'}]};
